pages.text: Similarly to the $(l:crystals/rift_crystal)Rift Crystal$(/l), the Universe Crystal has the "Obliterate" modes, which both cause 25% insanity. There is also another mode with the Universe Crystal, "Ultra Cleanse". The "Ultra Cleanse" mode clears you of all insanity, but adds 1% insanity. This mode is helpful for clearing permanent insanity. It requires a $(l:reagents/universe_reagent)Universe Reagent$(/l).
